page.description: The page of a collection to return.

page_size.description: The number of items to return per page.

X-Filter.description: Specifies the `X-Filter` header JSON object's filtering and sort criteria.

oneOf.description: Specify the name of the data field and the accompanying value.
oneOf.title: Simple filter

+and.description: All conditions need to be true.

items.description: Specify the name of the data field and the accompanying value.
items.title: Simple filter

+contains.description: The provided string needs to be in the value.

+gt.description: The value needs to be greater than the provided number.

+gte.description: The value needs to be greater than or equal to the provided number.

+lt.description: The value needs to be less than the provided number.

+lte.description: The value needs to be less than or equal to the provided number.

+neq.description: The provided string is left out of the results.

+or.description: At least one condition needs to be true.

items.description: Specify the name of the data field and the accompanying value.
items.title: Simple filter

+order.description: Sort in ascending (`asc`) or descending (`desc`) order. This defaults to `asc`. Requires `+order_by`.

+order_by.description: Order results based on the provided attribute. The attribute needs to be filterable.
